2016年的守望先锋真的让我眼前一亮，可我当时只是个初中生，只能好好学习，在2020年高考完我买了一个打折的守望先锋，虽然当时只有我一个人玩，但还是很开心，玩了一局之后感觉源氏不是那么简单，我又开始从奶妈和坦位入手先了解游戏，并且跟着视频在自定义苦练源氏。虽然我源氏还是有些菜但是我玩的真的很开心，开箱子也开出了最喜欢的英雄皮肤，守望1带给我的感觉真的很不错。但是有个叫暴雪的nt经常不做人事，联赛的事不管不问，还要受害者道歉。（暴雪尼玛好似）2016守望先锋的英雄已经不再是现在的英雄了。顺便问一句，暴雪什么时候似啊？

The amount of hope that the community has held out for the this game and the amount of abuse that they have received back from the developers and Activison Blizzard is beyond me, the developers and Activison Blizzard seem too not care about what the community wants and they continue to plaque the game with useless updates and balance changes every patch or update they do. The amount of lying and excusing people have given Blizzard in hopes of this game taking off once again or coming back is all gone, and Blizzard I feel has finally reached a point with the community to where everyone is extremely angry for being lied to for the last 3 years of false promises made with the release of the game. I feel like I could go on and on about their mistakes but I digress. I am all here for Overwatch decides to make that choice and come back and really wanting to set aside hope for the game to become much better, but as of now in Season: 6 of Overwatch 2 the game has not improved since launch and let alone since the destruction of Overwatch 1. I majorly discourage anyone who wants to try this game out, because it is a humongous dumpster fire of a franchise that Activison Blizzard refuses to support or their community and developers, and in that due turn makes the game consistently worse every time they try to revive it. Overall, I do love this game and this franchise a lot and have been supporting it since release of Overwatch 1 but it really kills me to see something that I loved so much and have sinked so much time into, and something with so much potential, that could have been very unique be completely dumped down the drain because of a company that could not care less about it.
依托答辩

猫

从前，我养了一只猫，我有十块钱，会用八块钱给它买吃的，经常给它洗澡，它也很粘我。

后来，我带它出去玩，路人觉得它很可爱，他们给它喂猫粮，火腿肠，我很不开心，因为它是我的。我想把它抱回家，可是它挣脱我，冲着给它好吃的人喵喵，我抱了几次他都不跟我走，还挠伤了我，于是我转身就走了.....

后来，偶然在路上遇到了它，它身上脏兮兮的。路人们只会给它好吃的，陪它玩玩，却不会带它回家，给它洗澡。它看到我后就跟着我回家，我把它关在了门外，它在门外喵喵地叫着，叫的我很难受，
可是我不会再要它了
。

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore
.

I am an OG player of Overwatch 1 with over 1100 hours, loved every minute (except the smurfs, you know who you are). I can't describe how perfect it was, maps, characters, loot system, pay once for the game and that's it, etc.

Now we have OW2 which is littered with monetisation, battle passes, locked heroes, content behind pay walls, removal of player level frames, not to mention reducing 6v6 to 5v5 on the same maps that were made for 6v6. They promised PVE if you pre-ordered it, which lots of us did, now they announce they have cancelled PVE and have put story missions behind ANOTHER pay wall at $20 a pop.

Overwatch has gone from one of the best games I have ever played to a money grabbing, sexuality pushing (#LeaveTheKidsAlone), hot mess of a game and I highly recommend investing your time elsewhere.

Been wanting to leave a negative review on this pile of trash since Overwatch 2's launch.

Having stuck with the game for well over 6 years, the absolute mockery that Blizzard Entertainment have made of its entire playerbase is inexcusable. They see their customers only as wallets, and this game as a cow to be milked until it's dry and ready for slaughter.

The egregious monetization present since the launch of the so-called "sequel" is what's driving this game into the dirt. The entire purpose of its existence, the massive PvE campaign it was supposed to have, has been scrapped in place of smaller missions costing $5 a pop at roughly 30 minutes playtime with zero replayability. Now they vow to "re-commit" to PvP, which is in its absolute worst state ever in terms of balancing, and characters locked behind paywalls at $9 each.

This leaves Overwatch 2, in comparison to its predecessor, as a worthless money-grabbing shop update with changes to the core gameplay that only make it worse.

Don't even bother. It's over.
I've done my part!

P.S. I dearly hope the art, animation, and writing teams for the game's story and cinematics can be hired onto a project they're passionate about, one that isn't careening into the Pacific.
